Side Effects: Does not stop nausea and vomiting.  Leaves you with a metallic taste in your mouth.
The major drowsiness lasted about 2 days. I am now able to take in the daytime and stay awake just fine. As for nausea and vomiting_ Diclegis worked better than I expected!
Comments: Check equivalent OTC ingredients before you spend too much on a prescription of this. Same ingredients can be purchased separately over the counter.
